title: AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION (DM)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Integrated Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science and Chemistry.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: ECONOMICS/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/ARABIC
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ENGLISH/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Literature in English and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and any other subject.

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: FRENCH (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French and any  other two (2)  Arts subjects.
subjects: French and any  other two (2) Art subjects.

title: HAUSA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

1. Geography

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies

4. Economics
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) Arts/Social Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/BIOLOGY

title: MATHEMATICS/COMPUTER EDUCATION

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE/SOCIAL STUDIES

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credits including English Language.
